properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 10:26PM CST until January 28 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City KS
properties.description:
...Widespread Accumulating Wet Snow Expected Tonight into
Tuesday...

* WHAT... A brief period of freezing rain followed by
accumulating snow. Snow accumulations of up to two inches.

* WHERE...Trego and Ellis Counties.

* WHEN...From 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ this evening to 1 PM CST /noon
MST/ Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions due to snow
packed roads and reduced visibility in snow.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CST TUESDAY
